articles.title: Daniel Ellsberg: Pentagon Papers whistleblower dies aged 92 - BBC
articles.description: His 1971 leak exposed lies about the Vietnam War and saw him dubbed "the most dangerous man in America".
articles.content:
Media caption, 2022 interview: Pentagon Papers whistle-blower Daniel Ellsberg says he was a secret back-up for Wikileaks
Daniel Ellsberg, the whistleblower who exposed the extent of US involvement i… [+4387 chars]
